MefPrice.description: Provides all amounts (tax included, duty free, tax rate), used currency and percentage to apply for Price Alteration.

dutyFreeAmount.description: All taxes excluded amount (expressed in the given currency)

taxIncludedAmount.description: All taxes included amount (expressed in the given currency)

taxRate.description: Price Tax Rate. Unit: [%]. E.g. value 16 stand for 16% tax.
